impossible
HK welfare system is very poor, CSSA got ard 3500 per month while mortage need 20K per month (while if I cant pay the mortgage i need to find 1 mil to sel my flat as the price dropped)

unless we have public housing, if not thats really difficult

I also agree we should have less confront with police as I always mentioned. Without guns we cannot fight with them (i mean direct fight)
